item.description:
Join the Gourmet Gurus for an exclusive wine tasting hosted by The Wine Gallery. The theme is Autumn Wines... we will pair the tasting with potluck appetizers. When you RSVP, please indicate what you will be bringing along in terms of cheese, crackers, spreads, antipasto, fruit etc. This wine tasting will require 15 people to attend and the cost is $20.00/per person. There is a firm RSVP date of 10/25/2008, because the The Wine Gallery will require one week's notice to cancel. I hope to see many of you there!!!!!

Sharon
item.name: Autumn Wine Tasting
